Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ConnectionSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ConnectionSocket
public class ConnectionSocket
extends java.lang.Object
ConnectionSocket class handles the connection between the client and the server.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public boolean setup​(java.lang.String nickname, ModelView modelView, ActionHandler actionHandler) throws DuplicateNicknameException, InvalidNicknameException
      Method setup initializes a new socket connection and handles the nickname-choice response. It loops until the server confirms the successful connection (with no nickname duplication and with a correctly configured match lobby).
      Parameters:
      nickname - of type String - the username chosen by the user.
      modelView - of type ModelView - the structure, stored into the client, containing simple logic of the model.
      actionHandler - of type ActionHandler - the class handling the answers.
      Returns:
      boolean true if connection is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DuplicateNicknameException - when the nickname is already in use.
      InvalidNicknameException - when the nickname contains illegal characters (like "-").

    • readInput

      private boolean readInput​(java.lang.String nickname, java.io.ObjectInputStream input) throws DuplicateNicknameException, InvalidNicknameException
      Method readInput handles the input reading in order to reduce the setup complexity.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of type String - the chosen nickname.
      input - of type ObjectInputStream - the input socket stream.
      Returns:
      boolean true if nickname is available and set, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DuplicateNicknameException - when the nickname has already been chosen.
      InvalidNicknameException - when the nickname contains illegal characters (like "-").

    • nicknameChecker

      public boolean nicknameChecker​(java.lang.Object input) throws DuplicateNicknameException, InvalidNicknameException
      Method nicknameChecker handles the nickname validation phase after the server answer about the availability of the desired username.
      Parameters:
      input - of type Object - the server ObjectStream answer.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the nickname is available and set, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DuplicateNicknameException - when the nickname has already been chosen.
      InvalidNicknameException - when the nickname contains illegal characters (like "-").

    • send

      public void send​(Message message)
      Method send sends a new message to the server, encapsulating the object in a SerializedMessage type unpacked and read later by the server.
      Parameters:
      message - of type Message - the message to be sent to the server.

    • send

      public void send​(UserAction action)
      Method send sends a new action to the server, encapsulating the object in a SerializedMessage type unpacked and read later by the server.
      Parameters:
      action - of type UserAction - the action to be sent to the server.
